a.span: Student Canvas and Google Access Request
Personnel Handbook and Acknowledgment of Receipt
Exam Exemption Policy and Grading Scales

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

h2.strong: The link below is for additional assignments for Prentiss County students. These assignments are a continuation of the instructional packets previously distributed.

Many parents have asked about when and where to turn in work. Students completed work may be turned in May 13th, 14th, and 16th from 8:00a.m. till 12:00p.m. at students’ home school location. Principals will be in contact with families on the procedures regarding the turn in.
Please contact your students’ teacher first if you have any questions about instructional packets.
If you have any questions or we can be of assistance to you please email pcsdinfo@prentiss.k12.ms.us

strong.a: Click here for Assignments – PCSD Instructional Plan Assignments

h4.strong: Every student must provide 2 proofs of residency each school year. The proofs must be dated within the previous month and state the mother or father’s name. If renting, you must provide current rental agreement (No rent receipts will be accepted)
